com.aware
Class Telephony

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.aware.Telephony

public class Telephony
extends Service

Telephony module. Keeps track of changes in the network operator and information: - Current network operator information - Cell Location ID's - Neighbor cell towers - Signal strength

Author:
denzil

Nested Class Summary
static class Telephony.BackgroundService
           
 class Telephony.TelephonyBinder
          Binder for Telephony module
static class Telephony.TelephonyMonitor
          Telephony module broadcast receiver - ACTION_AWARE_WEBSERVICE: upload data to remote server
static class Telephony.TelephonyProvider
          AWARE Telephony Content Provider Allows you to access recorded telephony, cell and neighbor towers from the database Database is located at the SDCard: /AWARE/telephony.db
static class Telephony.TelephonyState
          Tracks cell location and telephony information: - GSM: CID, LAC, PSC (UMTS Primary Scrambling Code) - CDMA: base station ID, Latitude, Longitude, Network ID, System ID - Telephony: IMEI/MEID/ESN, software version, line number, network MMC, network code, network name, network type, phone type, sim code, sim operator, sim serial, subscriber ID
 
Field Summary
static String ACTION_AWARE_CDMA_TOWER
          Broadcasted event: connected to a new CDMA tower
static String ACTION_AWARE_GSM_TOWER
          Broadcasted event: connected to a new GSM tower
static String ACTION_AWARE_GSM_TOWER_NEIGHBOR
          Broadcasted event: detected GSM tower neighbor
static String ACTION_AWARE_TELEPHONY
          Broadcasted event: new telephony information is available
